label: ManagementBody
name: Board / Senior Mgmt
primary_duties: Define, approve, and oversee ICT risk framework

label: ManagementBody
name: ICT Risk Overseer
primary_duties: Monitor arrangements with ICT third-party providers

label: ManagementBody
name: Training Compliance
primary_duties: Follow regular specific training on ICT risk
required_skills: Ability to assess ICT risk impact

label: ManagementBody
name: Budget Authority
primary_duties: Allocate budget for digital resilience and training

label: ManagementBody
name: Policy Approver
primary_duties: Approve ICT business continuity and recovery plans

label: ManagementBody
name: Audit Overseer
primary_duties: Review ICT internal audit plans and modifications
